import React,{ useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addTocart } from '../actions/cartAction' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' const CartScreen = ({location}) => { const productId = useParams().id console.log(uselocation().search) return (
CartScreen
) } export default CartScreen
